title: Blueberry Bear
description: Bear, how did you get so BLUE!Meet a rambunctious flat-coated retriever puppy named Bear who craves blueberries. Instead of following in her siblings paw prints, Bear follows her nose which gets her into more trouble than she can handle. Hold onto your knickers while Bear takes you spinning and laughing on one of her typical unruly days down on Farmer Bubba's blueberry farm.A pawsatively fun, down-on-the farm story with the cutest blue puppy imaginable!
author: Eileen Pieczonka
